description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 11/17/2005

Eric is enraged about not being invited into Brooke and Ridge’s new company idea.  Eric tries to convince Brooke to forget about fighting Stephanie and concentrate on their marriage.  Dante continues to try to convince Bridget that Nick cannot be trusted.  However Nick’s charm starts to get the better of her.  Stephanie offers Ridge a job however; Ridge refuses because he wants total control.
